example_usage: Anemia is without enough red blood cells.
Circumcision is removal around the foreskin.
Dislocation is displacement from normal position.
Evaporation is liquid turning to vapor.
Endoscopy is looking inside the body.
Epidermis is the outer layer of skin.
Hemiplegia is paralysis of half the body.
Mononucleosis affects one type of white blood cell.
Prognosis is forecast of disease outcome.
Quadriplegia is paralysis of all four limbs.

definition: Below or under or less than.

example_usage: Suprapubic is above the pubic bone.
